title: Violent Rioting Has Nothing to Do with George Floyd | 5/29/20
description:
Apparently, looting and burning are now considered “protest” activities. Police evacuated a Minneapolis police station as protesters torched it. A CNN reporter got arrested live on air for no apparent reason while covering the protests. Black business owners and “rednecks” defend businesses with legally owned guns. President Trump described the rioters as “thugs,” and the internet went crazy. Twitter censors yet another Trump tweet. CNN’s Don Lemon argued that conservatives care more about Target than George Floyd’s death. Stu gives the greatest COVID-19 story since the beginning of the pandemic. Joe Biden’s VP pick will reveal a lot about his campaign. Does the government have ANY power to close churches?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Apparently, looting and burning are now considered “protest” activities. Everybody was in agreement, so why is George Floyd's death being politicized?
